title: Great Clips Online Check-in
description:
ONLINE CHECK IN
See estimated wait times at Great Clips hair salons near you. Check in from anywhere to save your place in line.
Tap the Check In pin, pick your salon, enter your name and phone number, and tap Check Me In – no login, email, or profile required.
Let the salon know when you arrive.
ESTIMATED WAIT TIME
Estimated wait times assume you are getting the next available stylist. You can request a stylist upon arrival at the salon but your wait may be longer.
For safety and privacy reasons, we do not publish stylist schedules.
PROFILE BENEFITS
Haircut reminder feature
Save your favorite salons
